featured.text: When the hungry traveler saw the precious stone, he asked her to give it to him.
If he sold the stone, he thought, he 23 enough money for the rest of his life.
You gave me the stone without asking for anything 25 .
When he found her, he said, “I know how valuable this stone is, but I’m giving it back to you, 24 that you can give me something even more precious.

definition.en_def: A hard, solid substance that is found in the ground, often used for building or as a material.
definition.example: He picked up a smooth stone from the riverbank.
